metadata.title: CVE-2014-3986 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: include/tests_webservers in Lynis before 1.5.5 allows local users tooverwrite arbitrary files via a symlink attack on a /tmp/lynis.*.unsortedfile with an easily determined name.

criterions.comment: lynis: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
